Key Arguments: The legislation contains politically-loaded, broad, and subjective definitions.
The definition of harm is too expansive and could target religious beliefs.
Exclusions for professional news content and government-authorized content are hypocritical.
The bill could restrict freedom of speech and debate on important issues like climate change.
Notable Quotes: There is a great danger in framing legislation which contains politically-loaded, unnecessarily broad, and highly subjective definitions.
As a Christian, I worry that this legislation could be used particularly to target religious platforms or individuals who hold religious beliefs.
I find that these exclusions are utterly hypocritical.
A healthy, functioning democracy requires freedom of speech.
